remarks: A factor of a complex number apart from zero is apart from zero. Partial converse of ~ mulap0d and consequence of ~ mulap0bd . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 24-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mulap0bad.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulap0bad.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulap0bad.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) # 0 ) $.
mulap0bad $p |- ( ph -> A # 0 ) $.
